import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import sampleImg1 from "./exampleImages/pic1.jpg"; import sampleImg2 from "./exampleImages/pic2.jpg"; import sampleImg3 from "./exampleImages/pic3.jpg"; export default class StyleVisualization extends Component { pageStyle = { width:"94%", height:"100%", margin:'3%', backgroundColor:this.props.values.contentBackgroundColor, } headerStyle = { padding:"2vw", margin:0, color: this.props.values.websiteTitleColor, backgroundColor:this.props.values.titleBackgroundColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.websiteTitleSize}px`, textAlign:'center' } navBarStyle = this.props.values.navOrientation === "Horizontal" ? { display: 'block', backgroundColor: this.props.values.navBackgroundColor, width:"100%", height:"100%", marginTop:0 } : { display: 'inline-block', backgroundColor: this.props.values.navBackgroundColor, width:"15%", height:"100%", marginLeft:0, marginTop:0, } subPageStyle = { width:'80%', height:"100%", marginLeft:"5%", marginright:"5%", verticalAlign: 'top', marginTop:0, display: 'inline-block', } navLinkListStyle = { listStyleType: 'none', width:'100%', margin: 0, padding:"1vw", overflow: 'hidden', textAlign:'center' } navLinkStyle = this.props.values.navOrientation === "Horizontal" ? { display: 'inline-block', paddingLeft:'2vw', paddingRight:'2vw', color: this.props.values.navigationLinkColor, textAlign: 'center', textDecoration: 'none', fontSize: `${this.props.values.navigationLinkSize}px`, cursor:'pointer' } : { display: 'block', paddingLeft:'2vw', paddingRight:'2vw', marginTop:"4vh", color: this.props.values.navigationLinkColor, textAlign: 'center', textDecoration: 'none', fontSize: `${this.props.values.navigationLinkSize}px`, cursor:'pointer' } pageHeaderStyle = { color: this.props.values.pageHeaderColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.pageHeaderSize}px`, margin: '1em', textAlign:'center' } mediumHeaderStyle = { color: this.props.values.mediumHeaderColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.mediumHeaderSize}px`, margin: '.75em', textAlign:'center' } smallHeaderStyle = { color: this.props.values.smallHeaderColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.smallHeaderSize}px`, margin: '.5em', textAlign:'center' } descriptionStyle = { color: this.props.values.descriptionTextColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.descriptionTextSize}px`, margin: '.5em', textAlign:'center' } otherLinkStyle = { color: this.props.values.otherLinkColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.otherLinkSize}px`, margin: '.5em', textAlign:'center' } imageListStyle = { listStyleType: 'none', width:'100%', margin: 0, padding:"1vw", overflow: 'hidden', textAlign:'center', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', } imageStyle = this.props.values.portfolioArrangement === "Vertical" ? { display: 'block', marginLeft:"27%", padding:'2vw', width:"50%", height:"30vw", display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', cursor:'pointer' } : { display: 'inline-block', paddingLeft:'2vw', paddingRight:'2vw', width:"20vw", height:"15vw", cursor:'pointer' } footerStyle = { color: this.props.values.navLinkColor, fontSize:`${this.props.values.navLinkSize}px`, backgroundColor: this.props.values.navBackgroundColor, width:'100v%', height:'10vh', margin: 0, padding: 0 } render(){ return(
